description:
Riscrivere l'applicazione per supportare Windows oltre a macOS.

## Componenti da sostituire

| macOS | Windows |
|-------|---------|
| rumps (menubar) | pystray (system tray) |
| pync (notifiche) | win10toast / plyer |
| afplay (audio) | winsound / playsound |
| whisper-cpp homebrew | faster-whisper Python |
| ~/Library/ paths | %APPDATA% paths |
| open command | os.startfile() |
| launchctl (autostart) | Task Scheduler / startup folder |
